name: Space Snake Love Quest
description:
With Art by @TheOleShepherd

Your beloved busband the Oury Ouroboros of the Planet Pluto has broken all of his teeth! Travel along his back to find suitable replacements in this action-ish platform-ish game!

Dodge meteors and collect hearts along your way, fueled by the power of love while facing off against the less affectionate denizens of your cyclical hubby's back, Oury isn't picky about his dental implants, anything from a tree to a traffic cone will do.

Made for the Vimjam:collectables 8bits to Infinity Game Jam

Controls:

[A][D] - Move Left and Right

[Space] - Jump

[Left Mouse] - Ranged Attack

[Right Mouse] - Melee Attack

Sound effects from:

Female RPG Voice Starter Pack by Cicifyre (https://cicifyre.itch.io/rpg-voice-starter-pack)
Kenney Impact Sounds & Kenney RPG sounds (https://kenney.nl/assets)
Goblins Sound Pack by artisticdude (https://opengameart.org/content/goblins-sound-pack)
Big Scarry Troll Sounds by Darsycho(https://opengameart.org/content/big-scary-troll-sounds)
25 CC0 bang / firework SFX by rubberduck (https://opengameart.org/content/25-cc0-bang-firework-sfx)
foley footsteps >> footsteps_sneakers by tim.kahn (https://freesound.org/people/tim.kahn/sounds/44664/)

Rainyhearts font by Camellina
